title: Frontend Engineering Intern
details: Developed and maintaining responsive user interfaces using ReactJS, Redux, and Tailwind CSS, ensuring seamless collaboration. Focused on smooth integration and efficient development of cohesive web applications.

title: Technical Lead
details: Leading the website team to maintain and enhance the Devfest Patna website. Managing technical engagement for local developer meetups, ensuring interactive and insightful sessions

title: Mentor
details: Selected as a mentor for GSSoC'24, providing guidance and support to participants throughout the program. Actively engaged in fostering a collaborative and enriching learning environment.
